title: Kupu~!! Mamegoma!
synopsis: The story revolves around a palm-sized seal named Mameta, the other seals (Cherry-chan, Soda-kun, Lemon-chan, Candy-chan), and the Mamekawa family that raises the seals.
staff: [['Fujita, Akiko', ['Sound Director']], ['Miyamoto, Kanako', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Oohashi, Megumi', ['Music']], ['Morio, Maki', ['Art Director']]]
